attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Labour's done and is doing so much for us.
If Cameron becomes PM we won't get Labour's intrusive ID cards, troops being sent into battle without vital equipment, tax hikes for the poor to fund tax cuts for the rich (but don't worry you'll get it back as fuel credits - after all people are too stupid to decide how to spend their own money), £50bn handouts for reckless banks, tax credits screw ups that hammer families, pensions ruined, prisoners let out early, our personal database lost and stupidly high house prices.
Yes let's vote Labour

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
